title: SOLD - T216 Kotton Cy Young - PSA 1
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: SOLD - T216 Kotton Cy Young - PSA 1
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I'm selling the pictured T216 Kotton Cigarettes card of Cy Young.  It has been graded a PSA 1 - it's rough as you can see but impossible to find this card in any shape.

PSA has graded 3 T216 Youngs (all backs combined), with 2 PSA 1's and 1 PSA 2.  SGC has graded 3 as well - an A, a 20 and a 30, so holding out for a better one might not be realistic.

SOLD - any payment method is fine by me.  Shoot me a PM if interested.

Thanks for looking,
Scott
